argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | usgpredgvALT.v | |- V = ( 1st ` G ) |
| 2 |  | usgpredgvALT.e | |- E = ( Edges ` G ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( C e. E <-> C e. ( Edges ` G ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_edg | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. ( Edges ` G ) ) -> ( C e. ~P ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( C e. ~P ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elpwi | |- ( C e. ~P ( 1st ` G ) -> C C_ ( 1st ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_anim1i | |- ( ( C e. ~P ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) -> ( C C_ ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( C C_ ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> V = ( 1st ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_sseq2d | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( C C_ V <-> C C_ ( 1st ` G ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_anbi1d | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( ( C C_ V /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) <-> ( C C_ ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( C C_ V /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
